channel.title: Can someone tell me how to put hp on a monster
channel.description:
well the name of the sticky is pretty self explanitory, :D but i am serious, i am typing in ::npc 1 and that somes up with a man, but he has 0 hp :mad:
(it dosent have to be a man all of them have 0 hp)
can sum1 plz tell me (in an easy way) :([br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 11:18:28 PM[/size][hr]plz don't email me, i never read my emails lol :)
